title: Mechanism of non-competitive inhibition of the SARS-CoV-2 3CL protease dimerization: Therapeutic and clinical promise of the lichen secondary metabolite perlatolinic acid
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Lorenza Fagnani, Pierangelo Bellio, Antonio Di Giulio, Lisaurora Nazzicone, Roberto Iorio, Sabrina Petricca, Nicola Franceschini, Laura Bertarini, Donatella Tondi, Giuseppe Celenza
